properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Contents of the album, disc, etc.
properties.title: Table of Contents

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language term

properties.description:
This is the accession/box number that will help a researcher locate the original file.

Use this format:
Yyyy-## / ### (##)
properties.title: Box number

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description: Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.default_value: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

index.key: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

options.index: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

index.key: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Online streaming copy made available for research and non-commercial purposes only by creator. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

options.index: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Online streaming copy made available for research and non-commercial purposes only by creator. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

index.key: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Access restricted. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

options.index: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Access restricted. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca

properties.title: Usage rights

properties.default_value: Digitization possible in part through a Young Canada Works (YCW) program funded through the Department of Canadian Heritage and managed by the Canadian Council of Archives (CCA).
properties.title: Funding
